channel.title: RS2Pro #508
channel.description:
A simple 508 framework using the Netty API.
Me & Faab234 wrote this quite a while ago (6 months+), hence the non efficient programming.
Yes it's from scratch.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][*]Login (duh) [*]XTea [*]Rendering [*]Multi-player support [*]Security system [*]Chat [*]A lot of content framework started[/ul]
[b]Credits[/b] [b]Canownueasy (me):[/b] All the content, networking edits, conventions, comments, lots more. [b]Faab234:[/b] Networking, minimal content, packets
[b][u]THIS IS ONE OF THE FIRST 508 SERVERS THAT CAN HOLD 2000 PLAYERS WITHOUT LAG IN ALMOST ANY ENVIRONMENT[/u][/b]
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/RS2Pro%20%23508.rar
MEGA NOTE FOR NOOBS: You need to have the program arguments as: [code]PORT SECURITY[/code]
So if you want to run on 43594 and low security
[code]43594 LOW[/code]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/508pic.png[/img]

whats so special about it? its just a empty server nothing works, look at hp bar, run bar, prayer bar… fail…

item.title: RS2Pro #508
item.dc:creator: @c4r_t0yzzz c4r t0yzzz
item.description:
@c4r_t0yzzz wrote:

Dose the dl link have source and client ?

W000t first post!

Yeah but as we can all see you are a first time poster so your probably new to RSPS coding esspecialy asking a question like that so I recommend that you use this. It is a 317 so not as good graphics it is the easiest way to learn Java coding plus its Delta so perfect for beginners. ( Although some will argue that PI is better Delta, is the easiest way to learn everything is is one freaking file the all mighty client.java )

P.S. great job canownueazy I love your work.

lmao… Why would you go on some one thread and post that… Maybe he wants to learn 508’s… and yes, 317’s are good to start programming…

Read full topic

item.title: RS2Pro #508
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Pluvia, post:9, topic:365724”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=461924.msg3379270#msg3379270 date=1287888920]

Yeah but as we can all see you are a first time poster so your probably new to RSPS coding esspecialy asking a question like that so I recommend that you use this. It is a 317 so not as good graphics it is the easiest way to learn Java coding plus its Delta so perfect for beginners. ( Although some will argue that PI is better Delta, is the easiest way to learn everything is is one freaking file the all mighty client.java )

P.S. great job canownueazy I love your work.

You’re going to advertise your download in another thread and than argue that Delta is a good way to learn? What the hell? Its shit easy, but it only teaches bad programming habits.
[/quote]
What I was getting at was to use a Delta… so why the hell not mine? True it teaches bad programming habits but it is the easiest way to learn. Then after they really want to become “programmers” and not just make a bs RSPS ( as all first sources created by anyone with 0% java knowlage PI or not…)[/quote]
Why would you go to someones thread and tell someone to use a Delta in the first place? Sure a relatively blank 508 base would give a newcomer a lot of problems, but you shouldn’t come and tell them not to use it… Its disrespectful to Canownueazy.

Read full topic
